metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25311 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: condor_credd in HTCondor before 8.9.11 allows Directory Traversal outside the SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY_OAUTH directory, as demonstrated by creating a file under /etc that will later be executed by root.

criterions.comment: condor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
